LanguageData.ROM_FullMoonFuryDesc: When toggled, the werewolf will go into a furious rampage during a full moon. During furies, Werewolves can randomly transform into new forms and level up existing Werewolf forms.\n\nWARNING: No one is safe from a wild werewolf, not even other werewolves! Be sure to keep the Werewolves away from other colonists during the full moon.

LanguageData.ROM_MoonCycle_FullMoonDesc: The planet's moon, {0}, has reached its most clearly visible form. Colonists will receive minor mood boosts. Unblooded Werewolves may transform at this time.
LanguageData.ROM_MoonCycle_CurrentPhaseDesc: Each moon on your colony's planet, {0}, has a moon cycle. At the end of the cycle, a beautiful full moon will be visible to your colony.\n\nAny werewolves with active transformations will be triggered at that time.
